label: ExperienceFacility
comment: A structure or place, such as a restaurant, hotel, theme park, hot spring bathing pool, parking lot, or meeting room, that provides a particular experience.

datatypeProperties.comment: An architectural style, expressed as text, of this experience facility.
The date of the completion of this experience facility.
A type, expressed as text, of this experience facility.
The date of the latest renovation of this experience facility.
A specified physical location or place.
The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.
